reviewText: His voice is fantastic and closley associated with classical style of uzbek singing. Once again he is accompanied with national dances on these video clips. You can see talented OFARIN DANCE THEATRE ENSEMBLE here.

What I like about Mahmud Nomozov and his troupe is that he is always looking for innovative ways to showcase Uzbek folklore without seeming redundant nor overdone. It is what is as if an open door festical suddenly breaks out and everyone joins in the spirit.
